name: Spanish 101
details: Learn the fundamentals of the Spanish language, including grammar, vocabulary, and basic conversation skills.

name: French for Beginners
details: Discover the beauty of the French language through interactive lessons covering pronunciation, grammar, and essential phrases.

name: German Immersion
details: Immerse yourself in the German language and culture with this intensive course, focusing on speaking, reading, and listening comprehension.

name: Italian Conversation
details: Enhance your Italian language skills by engaging in conversations, discussing various topics, and improving your fluency.

name: Japanese Writing Workshop
details: Master the art of writing in Japanese, from the basic Hiragana and Katakana characters to more advanced Kanji characters.

name: Mandarin Chinese for Business
details: Develop your Mandarin Chinese language proficiency for business purposes, including vocabulary, cultural etiquette, and negotiation skills.

name: Russian Grammar Made Easy
details: Simplify the complexities of Russian grammar and gain confidence in reading, writing, and speaking this fascinating language.

name: Arabic Calligraphy
details: Explore the art of Arabic calligraphy, learning different styles and techniques to create beautiful and meaningful written expressions.

name: Portuguese for Travelers
details: Prepare for your trip to Brazil or Portugal by mastering essential Portuguese phrases and cultural nuances to enhance your travel experience.

name: Korean Pop Culture and Language
details: Dive into the world of Korean pop culture, learning the language through K-pop songs, dramas, and popular expressions.
